definition: to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining

sentences.english: He was particularly associated with protecting stags and subduing snakes.
sentences.chinese: 他与守护神牡鹿和征服蛇怪有密切联系。

sentences.english: Previously each city had its own elementalist temple.
sentences.chinese: 先前每个城市有它自己的自然力守护神的寺庙。

sentences.english: Will any of the Death Eaters have a decent patronus to offer the Dark Lord?
sentences.chinese: 有哪一个食死徒能够给黑魔王提供合适的守护神？

sentences.english: The image of the Patroness of the Church was wrenched out of the porch centuries ago.
sentences.chinese: 教堂的守护神像早在几百年前就从门廊里搬走了。

sentences.english: Mrs Ebert says that this piece of jewellery was "her own guardian angel".
sentences.chinese: 艾伯特太太说，这串珠宝是自己的“守护神”。

sentences.english: Oslash; Defensor and Menesor are vaporised after being caught in a plasma flare.
sentences.chinese: 守护神与飞天虎于一次等离子爆炸中人间蒸发。

sentences.english: He has since been worshipped as the tutelary god of the Chinese tea merchants.
sentences.chinese: 从那时起，陆羽被奉为中国茶商的守护神。

sentences.english: You are our Keeper, the Maker of heaven and earth who never sleeps or slumbers .
sentences.chinese: 您就是我们的守护神，天地的创造主，绝不会睡觉。

sentences.english: A fox family Nuwa was sent to lower the patron saint of stone.
sentences.chinese: 女娲座下灵狐族则被派遣下界守护神石。

sentences.english: Then, Hermes, the guardian God of the town, showed up.
sentences.chinese: 后来，赫尔墨斯，这个小镇的守护神，出现了。

sentences.english: The patronus did not answer the question, choosing instead to stare at Ron with great intensity .
sentences.chinese: 守护神并没有回答，而是目光灼灼地盯住罗恩。

sentences.english: Chiswick church is dedicated to St Nicholas, patron saint of sailors.
sentences.chinese: 奇西克教堂为水手的守护神圣尼古拉而建。

sentences.english: Hermione's Patronus turns out to be an otter.
sentences.chinese: 赫敏的守护神是一只水獭。

sentences.english: Defensor and Menesor are vaporised after being caught in a plasma flare.
sentences.chinese: 守护神与飞天虎于一次等离子爆炸中人间蒸发。

sentences.english: St David is the patron saint of Wales.
sentences.chinese: 圣大卫是威尔士的守护神。

definition: god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
